subject: ACTSC
title: Quantitative Risk Management
description: This course combines enterprise and quantitative risk management to provide a comprehensive coverage of risk management science with applications in finance, insurance and corporate governance. Topics covered include: risk taxonomy; risk measures; extreme value theory; copulas; stress and scenario testing; interest rate risk management, credit risk management; regulation, including Basel, Basel 3 and Solvency 2; risk adjusted return; capital allocation.
